channel.title: Can we get rid of this mercenary first contract?
channel.description:
Im sick of getting a really bad first contract as Mercenary.
You are saying Im going against my objective for getting a better contract but you dont say the fact, If I get a bad contract who will die anyways Im going even more against my objective.
Please, *LET MERCENARY PICK HER FIRST CONTRACT* and we will stop this problem.
Thanks.

item.title: Can we get rid of this mercenary first contract?
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Cuatrolan:

Please, LET MERCENARY PICK HER FIRST CONTRACT and we will stop this problem.

I literally just posted this 10 minutes ago lmao
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/mercenary-suggestion/46099

Read full topic
